title: Stockings & Suspenders
description: As the temperature drops, the women in this collection of stories find naughty and delicious ways to warm up for the holidays.A boss with a proposal to make her sweat, a promise from an Italian assistant, a cabin in the middle of nowhere with two men waiting to cater to her every desire, a special surprise for a lonely solider...All of these encounters and more from ten talented authors. Get ready for some holiday loving...Evernight style.
author: London Saint James
